content: Should we have some kind of roadmap so that people who discover RA can tell what's missing and what's coming next?

The last time we did tactical planing was https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/185405-t-compiler.2Fwg-rls-2.2E0/topic/Status.2FPlanning.20meeting. But yeah, I guess it might be a good idea to do some larger-scale roadmap drawing next
(we probably should discuss roadmap after mozilla all-hands)
@Laurențiu Nicola sorry for letting this slip! I feel like now we should wait until t-compiler folks are back from their vacation before planing further
It's all right, no pressure :-). rust-analyzer is shaping up quite nicely
Are there any immediate directions for rust-analyzer lately?

@Hoang Luu still nope, but with all-hands, vacations and rust-conf over, we are starting to do the planing.

I think the focus of the next half-year would be librarification: moving chalk forward, maybe starting on type-checking extraction, maybe starting on parser extraction.
